snippet.title: Deluded Mind - Environment Showcase
snippet.description:
Deluded Mind [http://bit.ly/DeludedMind] is a plot-based horror game, played from the first-person perspective. It is being developed by Pyxton Studios UG (limited liability) and will be published in 2018 for Windows operating system.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developer: Pyxton Studios UG (limited liability)
Publisher: Pyxton Studios UG (limited liability)
Genres: Horror, Adventure, Action
Platforms: Microsoft Windows, (Mac), (Linux), (PlayStation 4)
Age Restriction: TBD

Company Website: http://www.pyxtonstudios.com/
Game Website: http://www.deludedmindgame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeludedMindGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeludedMindGame

If you want to be kept in the loop please like us on Facebook and/or follow us on Twitter - we'd really appreciate your interest and support!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The music was exclusively composed by Iliya Ryakhovskiy.
https://www.facebook.com/Zioma-Music-...



© 2016 - 2018, Pyxton Studios UG (limited liability). Deluded Mind and Pyxton Studios are trademarks or registered trademarks of Pyxton Studios UG (limited liability). Unreal, Unreal Engine 4, UE4 and the respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Epic Games, Inc, in the USA and other countries. All rights reserved.
